title: Carta Demo
description: Exercises every core feature: custom schemas, all port polarities, organizers

pages.name: friendship.ai
pages.description: The app that will change the world.

values.title: Create Account
values.description: As a lonely person, I want to create an account on friendship.ai so that I can finally have friends (for $9.99/mo)

values.title: Order Subscription
values.description: As a user who craves validation, I want to subscribe to a premium plan so that I can unlock Platinum Friendsâ„¢
Email, password, and a checkbox agreeing friendship is worth paying for
Feed of algorithmically curated friend suggestions
Pricing tiers: Free (no friends), Basic ($9.99, 3 friends), Platinum ($29.99, unlimited friends)
Validates email isn't already monetized, creates account
Processes payment and upgrades friendship tier

values.columns: id SERIAL PK, email VARCHAR(255), password_hash VARCHAR(255), display_name VARCHAR(100), created_at TIMESTAMP
id SERIAL PK, user_id INT FK, plan VARCHAR(50), status VARCHAR(20), created_at TIMESTAMP

pages.name: story-map
pages.description: Product story map: personas, user stories, and feature prioritization

values.name: PM Priya
values.goal: Track team progress and prioritize work

values.name: Design Dana
values.goal: Validate designs with real user flows

values.title: View sprint board
values.description: As a PM, I want a kanban board so that I can see what's in progress

values.title: Set priorities
values.description: As a PM, I want to drag-rank items so that the team knows what to work on next

values.title: Export roadmap
values.description: As a PM, I want to export a roadmap PDF so that I can share with stakeholders

values.title: Link PRs to tasks
values.description: As a developer, I want to link GitHub PRs so that code reviews have context

values.title: Keyboard shortcuts
values.description: As a developer, I want keyboard shortcuts so that I can navigate without leaving the keyboard

values.title: API access
values.description: As a developer, I want a REST API so that I can automate workflows

values.title: Attach mockups
values.description: As a designer, I want to attach Figma links so that devs see the latest designs

values.title: User flow diagrams
values.description: As a designer, I want to embed flow diagrams so that the team understands the UX
Email/password authentication with OAuth options
New user registration form
Main overview with recent orders and metrics
Full order info with line items, status, and actions
Multi-step form for creating a new order

values.name: processOrder
values.description: Validates and persists new orders

values.name: getOrder
values.description: Retrieves order by ID

values.name: sendNotification
values.description: Sends email/SMS notifications

values.name: generateInvoice
values.description: Generates PDF invoices from order data

values.columns: id UUID PK, type VARCHAR, payload JSON, ts TIMESTAMP

values.content: TODO: Add retry logic for failed ingests
Consider adding CDC from the events table

pages.name: sentence-diagram
pages.description: Grammar parse tree: the quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog

values.text: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog

pages.name: capability-map
pages.description: Personas, domains, deployables, features, capabilities web

values.name: Authentication
values.description: Identity, login, and access control

values.name: Payments
values.description: Billing, subscriptions, and invoicing

values.name: Notifications
values.description: Push, email, and in-app alerts

values.name: Analytics
values.description: Usage tracking and reporting

values.title: See usage dashboards
values.description: As a PM, I want to view usage analytics

values.title: Generate invoices
values.description: As a PM, I want to generate customer invoices

values.title: Integrate SSO
values.description: As a developer, I want to integrate SSO into my app

values.title: Track events
values.description: As a developer, I want to instrument event tracking

values.title: Reset my password
values.description: As an end user, I want to reset my forgotten password

values.title: Get notifications
values.description: As an end user, I want push notifications on my phone

values.title: Manage subscription
values.description: As an end user, I want to upgrade or cancel my plan

values.title: Enable 2FA
values.description: As an end user, I want to secure my account with 2FA

pages.name: bpmn-order-fulfillment
pages.description: BPMN order fulfillment process showcasing rendering options: circles (events), diamonds (gateways), documents (data objects), default (activities), simple (notes), and organizers (pools/lanes)

values.name: Validate Order
values.description: Check order details and customer info

values.name: In Stock?
values.description: Check if items are available in warehouse

values.name: Pick & Pack
values.description: Retrieve items from warehouse and package

values.name: Place Backorder
values.description: Order items from supplier

values.name: Merge
values.description: Rejoin after inventory decision

values.name: Ship Order
values.description: Dispatch package to customer

values.name: Purchase Order
values.description: Customer order with line items and shipping address

values.name: Shipping Label
values.description: Carrier label with tracking number

values.content:
This page demonstrates Carta's rendering options:

â€¢ Circles = Events (start/end)
â€¢ Diamonds = Gateways (decisions)
â€¢ Documents = Data Objects
â€¢ Rounded rects = Activities
â€¢ Sticky notes = Notes (simple mode)
â€¢ Organizers = Pools & Lanes

customSchemas.semanticDescription: A processing stage within a pipeline (kitchen-sink demo)
A complete sentence in a grammar parse tree
A noun phrase (NP) in a grammar parse tree
A verb phrase (VP) in a grammar parse tree

ports.label: Constituents
ports.semanticDescription: Words and phrases in this VP

customSchemas.semanticDescription: A prepositional phrase (PP) in a grammar parse tree

ports.label: Constituents
ports.semanticDescription: Words and phrases in this PP

ports.label: Modifies
ports.semanticDescription: The verb or noun this PP modifies

customSchemas.semanticDescription: A noun (N) terminal in a grammar parse tree

ports.label: Modified by
ports.semanticDescription: Adjectives and articles that modify this noun

customSchemas.semanticDescription: A verb (V) terminal in a grammar parse tree

ports.label: Modified by
ports.semanticDescription: Adverbs or phrases that modify this verb

customSchemas.semanticDescription: An adjective (Adj) terminal in a grammar parse tree
A preposition (P) terminal in a grammar parse tree
A user persona representing a type of user with specific goals and pain points

ports.label: Stories
ports.semanticDescription: User stories belonging to this persona

customSchemas.semanticDescription: Database operation or query executed by application code
User persona representing a stakeholder archetype
User story describing desired functionality from a persona's perspective
Product feature belonging to a domain, deployed in an app
Deployable application that hosts features and capabilities
Specific capability provided by a feature, consumed by user stories
